NarrativeTest/report_example.name: Example HTML Report
NarrativeTest/report_example.subtitle: Show an example HTML Report
NarrativeTest/report_example.description: Demonstrate a KBase HTML Report using some simple inputs.

NarrativeTest/test_input_params.name: Test Input Parameters
NarrativeTest/test_input_params.subtitle: Used for testing that input parameters are properly validated.
NarrativeTest/test_input_params.tooltip: Used for testing that input parameters are properly validated.
NarrativeTest/test_input_params.description:
This is a tiny method intended for just automated testing that parameters of different forms validate (or not) as expected.

It still runs, though! All it does is make a copy of a genome. Kinda boring, yes, but it's mainly for testing and validation.

kb_uploadmethods/import_gff_fasta_as_met.name: Import GFF3/FASTA file as Annotated Metagenome Assembly from Staging Area
kb_uploadmethods/import_gff_fasta_as_met.subtitle: Import a GFF3 and FASTA file from your staging area into your Narrative as an Annotated Metagenome Assembly data object
kb_uploadmethods/import_gff_fasta_as_met.tooltip: Import a GFF3 and FASTA file from your staging area into your Narrative as an Annotated Metagenome Assembly data object
kb_uploadmethods/import_gff_fasta_as_met.description: Import a GFF or FASTA file from your staging area into your Narrative as a Genome data object. Please see the Data Upload/Download Guide for more information.

NarrativeTest/test_input_widget.tooltip:
Tests input widgets by just loading a simple, predefined widget.
This one just has a KBaseBiochem.Media object as an input.
NarrativeTest/test_input_widget.description: This is a tiny method intended for just loading a custom input widget for testing.

NarrativeTest/introspect_job.name: Introspect Job
NarrativeTest/introspect_job.subtitle: Introspect the information provided to an app
NarrativeTest/introspect_job.tooltip: Introspect the information provided to an app
NarrativeTest/introspect_job.description: Just returns the information submitted to a job. If a token is in the context object where it's expected, it gets scrubbed out.

fba_tools/edit_media.name: Edit Media
fba_tools/edit_media.subtitle: Edit an existing media formulation.
fba_tools/edit_media.description: Edit a media formulation by adding or removing compounds, changing concentrations, or adjusting flux bounds.

ProkkaAnnotation/annotate_contigs.name: Annotate Assembly and Re-annotate Genomes with Prokka(v1.12)
ProkkaAnnotation/annotate_contigs.subtitle: Annotate Assembly and Re-annotate Genomes with Prokka annotation pipeline.
ProkkaAnnotation/annotate_contigs.tooltip: Annotate Assembly and Re-annotate Genomes with Prokka annotation pipeline.
ProkkaAnnotation/annotate_contigs.description:
This is a KBase wrapper for the Prokka annotation pipeline.

Prokka is a software tool for the rapid annotation of prokaryotic genomes. A typical 4Mbp genome can be fully annotated in less than 20 minutes.

For rRNA prediction this app currently uses Barrnap (written by the author of Prokka and recommended if you prefer speed over absolute accuracy).

See more information at https://github.com/kbaseapps/ProkkaAnnotation/blob/master/README.rst

Prokka version: 1.12

Barrnap version: 0.8

publications.display_text: Seemann T. Prokka: rapid prokaryotic genome annotation. Bioinformatics. 2014;30: 2068 2069. doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu153

kb_quast/run_QUAST_app.name: QUAST - Quality Assessment Tool for Genome Assemblies
kb_quast/run_QUAST_app.subtitle: Run QUAST on a set of assemblies to assess quality.
kb_quast/run_QUAST_app.tooltip: Run QUAST on a set of assemblies to assess quality.
kb_quast/run_QUAST_app.description: This is a KBase wrapper for version 4.4 of the QUAST assembly quality assessment tool.

publications.display_text: Alexey Gurevich, Vladislav Saveliev, Nikolay Vyahhi and Glenn Tesler, QUAST: quality assessment tool for genome assemblies, Bioinformatics (2013) 29 (8): 1072-1075. doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btt086 First published online: February 19, 2013

Alla Mikheenko, Gleb Valin, Andrey Prjibelski, Vladislav Saveliev, Alexey Gurevich, Icarus: visualizer for de novo assembly evaluation, Bioinformatics (2016). doi: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btw379 First published online: July 4, 2016
